Bacon.name: Bacon

constructors.description: This class provides the ability to cook bacon.

stopFryBacon.description: Stop frying the bacon, it's done already

_over.description: Called on mouseover to start cooking the bacon

cook.description: An override method for extending this class to maybe fry eggs too.

_out.description: Called on mouseout to stop cooking the bacon

baconStart.description: The event letting you know that the bacon is cooking

baconReady.description: Event fired when the bacon is ready for cooking.

baconDone.description: The event letting you know that the bacon is done cooking

Bacon.description: This class provides the ability to cook bacon.

bacon.description: The Bacon Utility allows you to cook bacon on any HTML element.
bacon.name: bacon
